title: Super Cute BRIGHT 1Bdr w/ Peaceful & Serene Living Room! Reno Kitchen!
posting_body: See Video of unit here:
AWESOME & spacious 1 Bedroom just blocks from the Lake with highly desired spread out floorplan!
This unit has amazing bay windows in the living room that look out to peaceful foliage and birds chirping in the morning!
The kitchen and bathroom are both modernly appointed, and there is a ton of closet space!
This unit has a large closet in the living room and easily can be used as a compact 2 Bedroom as well.
This is a MUST SEE unit in a very well maintained, small respectfully conscious building a few blocks from the center of east Lake Merritt.
A must see!
Laundry onsite
Water/sewer, hot water and garbage included in the rent.
Quiet and respectful, small intimate community
Secure entrance building, with DoorKing Intercom system
Rent: $2095/month
Deposit: $1000
Lease Length: 12 mo then month to month
Available now
Cats are welcome, as well as service animals/ESA.
Bike storage option in basement on first come first serve basis
Please text or call Jessica at
show contact info
to see this unit any time!
